alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island; Inland Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 12:19AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Galveston and east central Brazoria Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1218 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 2 miles northwest of Jamaica Beach, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, La Marque, Santa Fe, Hitchcock, Bayou Vista, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, Offatts Bayou, Galveston Pleasure Pier and Moody Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island; Inland Galveston
